scripts.init: pnpm install && pnpm exec playwright install
scripts.clean:all: pnpm clean && rimraf node_modules suites/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules
scripts.clean:dry-run: echo 'Would clean:' && echo '- All dist/build directories' && echo '- Root node_modules' && find suites packages -name node_modules -type d 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.docker:reset: docker compose exec -T infra-db sh -c "set -a; . /secrets/.env; set +a; npx prisma migrate reset --force" && docker compose up -d --force-recreate infra-db
